messages.zh: 人们总说巨大财富的背后都隐藏着罪恶，
messages.en: People always say behind affluence wealth hides sin.

messages.zh: 那么巨大财富的面前，就只剩不太雅观的斗殴和流血了。
messages.en: What if the immense wealth is shown before you, then of course you’ll fight tool and nail for it, and then like animals for a piece of that wealth.

messages.zh: 果然只有这个洞口可以出入，对吧？
messages.en: This is the cave entrance, right?

messages.zh: 嗯。洞窟里面虽然有很多岔路，不过村里的大人带我来过几次，包括继任村长那天......
messages.en: Yes, while there are many branching paths. The previous village chief brought me here a few times before. I came here again the day I became the new village chief.

messages.zh: ......那个，不知道是不是我的错觉，那边，森林里面的喊声是不是更多了......
messages.en: ... Erm,  I don't know if it’s just my imagination, but I hear more shouting in the forest.

messages.zh: 再拖延下去，情况只会更加恶化。
messages.en: Further delay will only worsen the situation.

messages.zh: 可萝尔，你知道山洞中的道路，我想让你马上进入洞窟，沿着暗道去提前拿到宝藏。
messages.en: Carol, since you know the way. I want you to go into the tunnel right now and get the treasure ahead of time.
What! Are you planning to-

messages.zh: 我留在这个洞口。
messages.en: I will stay here and guard the entrance.

messages.zh: 不行！
messages.en: I refuse!
Carol...

messages.zh: 你要一个人面对那么多的赏金猎人？太危险了！你，你这样会——
messages.en: There’s too many bounty hunters out there for you to face alone! It’s too dangerous! You, you're going to --

messages.zh: 如果不能帮你拿到宝藏，我既对不起村子，也辜负了你。
messages.en: If I can't help you get the treasure, I will not only have failed the village, but you as well.

messages.zh: ......可我不想失去你。
messages.en: ... But I don’t want lose you.

messages.zh: 这里，这里也不是你该逞英雄的场合......！
messages.en: This isn't, this isn't the time to be a hero!

messages.zh: 逞英雄又有什么不好呢。
messages.en: There’s nothing wrong with being a hero.

messages.zh: “即便心脏被敌寇的利刃刺穿，国王的骑兵亦不解下手中长枪。”
messages.en: Even if their hearts are pierced by the enemy sword, the king's cavalry shall never let go of their lance.

messages.zh: 我绝不会在这里逃走。
messages.en: I shall never run away.
Grani...

messages.zh: 而且可萝尔，这不只是我一个人的战斗。
messages.en: Carol, this is not only my fight.

messages.zh: 你也有你的战斗。也许你会因此遭遇危险，但只要能让这片土地回归平静……
messages.en: You have your own battles too. You may be in danger because of it, but if you can bring peace to this land....

messages.zh: 我们就必须去做这些。
messages.en: We must do our part.

messages.zh: 宝藏那边就交给你了。
messages.en: I’ll leave the treasure to you.

messages.zh: 可是......我一个人的话......
messages.en: But...... Me alone...
The treasure...

messages.zh: 相信我。
messages.en: Believe in me.

messages.zh: 何况，我一定会照顾好你的。在广场救下你之后我就已经下定决心，绝不会让任何人再从你这夺走什么。
messages.en: Besides, I promised to take good care of you. After saving you in the square, I made up my mind that I would never let anyone take anything from you again.

messages.zh: 哪怕只是根头发。
messages.en: Not even a single hair.

messages.zh: ......你明明还是一个小孩子......
messages.en: ...You're only a kid...

messages.zh: 我可不是什么......我只是个子不高而已啊！
messages.en: I'm not a kid... I'm just not tall!

messages.zh: 呵呵。
messages.en: Haha.

messages.zh: ......嗯，我会和你一起行动的，格拉尼。
messages.en: Yeah, let’s do this together. Grani.

messages.zh: 该死的白面具，怎么连你们都要来碍事！
messages.en: Damn the white masks! Even you are getting in the way!

messages.zh: 乌合之众。
messages.en: A bunch of weaklings.

messages.zh: 没有资格和我们争夺宝藏。
messages.en: You’re not qualified to compete against us for the treasure.

messages.zh: 啊？你在说什么？这里早就被我们占下来了，你们还是夹着尾巴滚蛋吧！
messages.en: Huh? Are you being ridiculous? We were the first ones to occupy this place. You should run away with your tail tucked between your legs.

messages.zh: （这个角度能恰好看到南面的战场，看来赏金猎人和整合运动已经展开了混战。）
messages.en: (I have a good view of the battle to the south from this angle, looks like the bounty hunters and the reunion movement are already fighting.)

messages.zh: （接下来，无论哪一方的人接近这个洞口，我只要——）
messages.en: Then, no matter which side approaches this cave, I just have to--)

messages.zh: 趁他们在那边打成一团，我们冲进去！
messages.en: Let's rush in while they are all busy fighting with each other!

messages.zh: 等等，有个小个子站在那里！
messages.en: Wait, there's a little guy standing there!

messages.zh: 没人可以通过这里。
messages.en: None of you shall pass.

messages.zh: 咕哇——
messages.en: Uwah——

messages.zh: 你、你——
messages.en: You, you——

messages.zh: 你们，全都给我让开。
messages.en: Each and every one of you, get out of my way.

messages.zh: 我现在心情很差。
messages.en: I'm in a very bad mood.
